title: The Eolian Harp - because breeze is "desultory"

content.prompt: Which of the following occurs directly because the breeze is "desultory" (line 14)?

choices.label: The speaker cannot clearly hear the harp.
The music of the harp is not evenly sustained.
The speaker is obliged to personify the harp.
The music of the harp distracts the speaker.

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
